term.title: volume viscosity

item.text: A quantity ζ which enters into equations at any point where the flow involves a change in volume, i.e. is dilatational. If the deformation is purely dilatational, the average of three normal stress components is: σ = 1 3 ( σ x x + σ y y + σ z z is the hydrostatic pressure at the point considered in the absence of motion.
